Clean

e_clean.Rd

Removes base data.frame.

e_clean(e)

Arguments

e

An echarts4r object as returned by e_charts.

Details

Removes the core database after all operations are exectuted, lightens up the load on final visualisation.

Examples

df <- data.frame(
  x = 1:10,
  y = round(
    runif(10, 1, 100), 2
  )
)

df %>%
  e_charts(x) %>%
  e_line(y) %>%
  e_format_y_axis(suffix = "%") %>%
  e_format_x_axis(prefix = "A") %>%
  e_clean()
#> Warning: There is no need for this function any longer.
